entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 01:57 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure: 99.3 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.7°C
Wind: SSW 24 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
